steps.title: Control is not convinced
text: But the computer has the evidence

steps.title: The countdown starts
text: Nothing left to chance, all is working
Trying to relax, up in the capsule

steps.title: Back at ground control, there is a problem
text: Go to rockets full, not responding
Hello Major Tom, are you receiving
Turn the thrusters on, we're standing by

steps.title: Far beneath the ship, the world is mourning
